# u-navbar

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                        | Type                | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ------- |
| `fixed`    | `fixed`    | should the navbar be fixed to the top or bottom of the screen - layout should be position relative | `boolean`           | `true`  |
| `position` | `position` | position of the navbar                                                                             | `"bottom" \| "top"` | `'top'` |
